scripts.preview: npm run build && wrangler pages dev ./dist
scripts.db:check:local: wrangler d1 execute DB --local --command="SELECT name FROM sqlite_master WHERE type='table'"
scripts.db:check:remote: wrangler d1 execute DB --remote --command="SELECT name FROM sqlite_master WHERE type='table'"
scripts.db:restore:local: powershell -Command "$file = Get-ChildItem ./backups/local-*.bookmark | Sort-Object LastWriteTime -Descending | Select-Object -First 1; if ($file) { $content = Get-Content $file; $match = $content | Select-String -Pattern 'The current bookmark is ''([^'']*)'''; if ($match) { $bookmark = $match.Matches.Groups[1].Value; Write-Host 'Found bookmark:' $bookmark; wrangler d1 time-travel restore DB --bookmark=$bookmark } else { Write-Host 'No bookmark found in file' } } else { Write-Host 'No backup file found' }"
